requestBody.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Host-Dependent and Complexity-Based Duration. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Scheduled Shuttle Service (Airport/Route-Based). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The On-Demand Shuttle (Zone-Based Pickup). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
